itemDescription: English spiritualist and author, founder of Bedford College for women, wife of Augustus de Morgan

wikipedia_page.main: Sophia Elizabeth De Morgan (née Frend; 1809–1892) was an English spiritualist writer and activist.

response: *Augustus De Morgan, Sophia Elizabeth De Morgan, Arthur Cowper Ranyard. Newton: his friend, and his niece. 1st ed (reprinted). London: Dawsons, 1968. 161 pp.  0712903305.
